Referring to opinion polls that find Eamon Gilmore the most popular politician in the state, Ivana Bacik predicts a seismic shift in what were once conservative voting patterns. It is possible that we could have a government led by Labour. For the last 90 years every single government has been headed by either Fianna F?il or Fine Gael. So Labour coming out on top would be a really historic change. Even to be contemplating that scenario is massive change. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
